questions.question: What is the native chicken breed of Timor-Leste?
Chickens play an important role in Timorese agriculture and diet.

What is 'batar' in relation to chicken feed?
Proper water supply is crucial for chickens, especially in Timor-Leste's climate.
What is the most common method of incubation for small-scale chicken keepers in Timor-Leste?
choices: Shipping in day-old chicks from hatcheries
Purchasing adult birds from other farmers

questions.question: Which of the following is a common chicken disease in Timor-Leste?
Vaccination is an important preventive measure for maintaining chicken health.
What is the purpose of biosecurity practices in chicken keeping?
choices: To prevent the introduction and spread of diseases
questions.answer: To prevent the introduction and spread of diseases

questions.question: Traditional Timorese remedies can be used for all chicken health issues.
How can chickens be integrated into permaculture systems?
What is a chicken tractor?
choices: A mobile coop used for targeted grazing and soil improvement
A machine used to process chicken feed
A tool used for catching chickens
A device used for transporting chickens to market
questions.answer: A mobile coop used for targeted grazing and soil improvement

questions.question: Which of the following is an introduced chicken breed in Timor-Leste?

Predator protection is an important consideration when designing chicken housing in Timor-Leste.
What is the purpose of nesting boxes in a chicken coop?
choices: To provide a safe and comfortable place for hens to lay eggs
To keep chickens warm at night
questions.answer: To provide a safe and comfortable place for hens to lay eggs

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common local material used for building chicken coops in Timor-Leste?

choices: It requires minimal equipment and intervention
It results in higher egg production
questions.answer: It requires minimal equipment and intervention

questions.question: Which of the following is a sign that a chicken may need veterinary attention?
Newcastle disease can be prevented through vaccination.
What is the main benefit of using chicken manure as fertilizer?
choices: It reduces the need for watering

questions.question: How can chickens help with pest control in gardens?
choices: By eating insects and other small pests
By scratching and disturbing pest habitats
By alerting gardeners to the presence of pests

questions.question: Improving chicken production can contribute to food security and livelihoods in Timor-Leste.
What is the purpose of the student assignment in this lesson?
choices: To learn about real-world chicken keeping practices in their community
To experiment with different chicken breeds
To sell eggs and meat for profit
questions.answer: To learn about real-world chicken keeping practices in their community

questions.question: Traditional knowledge and practices can play a valuable role in chicken husbandry in Timor-Leste.
